类 Validation

方法详细信息

stringsLengthWithinRange

public boolean stringsLengthWithinRange(java.lang.String s,
                                        int Minimun,
                                        int Maximun)
Check if the length of input is between the minimun number and the maximun number.

参数：
s - The input String type message.
Minumun - The minumun number to limit the length of input message.
Maximun - The Maximun number to limit the length of input message.
返回：
True if the length is within range.Else return false.

WithinRange

public boolean WithinRange(int i,
                           int Minimun,
                           int Maximun)
Check if the value of input is between the minimun number and the maximun number.

参数：
s - The input integer type message.
Minumun - The minumun number to limit the value.
Maximun - The Maximun number to limit the value.
返回：
True if the value is within range.Else return false.
